summary: THE FUEL TANK IS MOUNTED TO THE FRAME OF THE MOTORCYCLE USING TWO BOLTS AFT, AND ONE BOLT UP FRONT. DUE TO EXPANSION OF THE TANK - 1/4" LENGTHWISE -  THE FRONT BOLT IS BEING BENT, AND IS THUS NOT SECURE. THIS IN TURN MAKES THE TANK NOT SECURED, WHICH POSES AN EXTREME SAFETY-RISK....UPDATED 09/22/15 *BF    UPDATED 11/06/2017*CN
